divs: Sighting DetailsI was just standing in my backyard one afternoon and looked up and saw a sliver craft moving from north to south. It was pretty high and had no wings, made no noise. I thought it might be a balloon but seemed to be moving under its own power in a straight line. It had a definite circular shape that I could see and it was metallic with a dome. I have attached a sketch of the shape.
trends: There have been 26 other sightings in Tallahassee
There were no other sightings in Tallahassee on or around July 15th 2011
Summary: It was just slowly moving across the sky from north to south
